metadata.title: AI Caricature Generator - Turn Photos into Cartoon Portraits
metadata.description: Transform your photos into fun caricature portraits with AI. Choose from 6 unique styles including classic, 3D cartoon, chibi, pop art and more.

page.title: AI Caricature Generator
page.description: Upload your photo and transform it into a fun cartoon caricature portrait with AI.

generator.title: ChatGPT Caricature Generator
generator.upload_photo_hint: Upload a clear face photo for best results
generator.upload_error: Photo upload failed, please try again
generator.additional_details_placeholder: Any extra details you want in the caricature...
generator.upload_and_generate_hint: Upload a photo, pick a style, and hit Create!
